paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a BRCA2 somatic mutation found in a case of locally advanced rectal cancer.

individual_records.phenotype_details: locally advanced rectal cancer with complete pathological response to neoadjuvant chemotherapy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: We report a case of a 25-year-old male with LARC treated with neoadjuvant FOLFOX chemotherapy, and experienced a pCR.

functional_data.summary: The presence of BRCA2 somatic mutation was associated with high mutation loads and an excellent response to oxaliplatin-based chemotherapy.

variants.additional_notes: This is the first report of a BRCA2 mutant LARC that demonstrated significant benefit from FOLFOX neoadjuvant treatment.
key_quotes: To our knowledge, this is the first report of BRCA2 mutant LARC that demonstrated significant benefit from FOLFOX neoadjuvant treatment.
The presence of BRCA2 somatic mutation (c.2231C>A p.S744*) was observed.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was reported in the paper.
